AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa: Defendant in a court case for illegal re-entry after deportation, native and citizen of Mexico, sentenced to 90 months of imprisonment, made statements under oath, has a family situation and is a member of a gang
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court for the Sou: Court where the case is being heard, calculated advisory guideline range and sentenced defendant, considered Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's family situation and membership in a gang during sentencing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Plea Agreement between Rogelio Valero-De: Agreement between defendant and the United States regarding guilty plea and sentencing, including a factual basis for the guilty plea and waiver of right to collaterally attack conviction or sentence. The agreement includes concessions by the United States in exchange for waivers contained in the Agreement.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bureau of Prisons: Agency responsible for imprisonment of Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Plea Agreement Addendum between Rogelio: Addendum to the Plea Agreement, outlining additional terms or conditions. The addendum states that the defendant is aware of their right to appeal the sentence imposed and waives this right.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's counsel: Defendant's legal representative, accused of being ineffective in representing Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa, subject to standards of professional conduct
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission's Gu: Federal guidelines for sentencing, including Amendment 742 which eliminated recency points effective November 1, 2010
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Indictment against Rogelio Valero-De La: Formal charges of illegal re-entry after deportation against the defendant
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Charges of illegal re-entry after deport: Criminal charges pending against the defendant, includes violation of supervised release by committing additional offenses
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Report and Recommendation to the United: Document recommending acceptance of guilty plea and entry of final judgment of guilt
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Order of the United States District Cour: Court order adopting the Report and Recommendation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Presentence Report prepared by the Unite: Report calculating advisory imprisonment range based on total offense level and criminal history category
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Supplemental Addendum to Presentence Rep: Additional information provided in support of sentencing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Letters submitted by Rogelio Valero-De L: Character references provided to mitigate sentence
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Request for reduced sentence based on mi: Downward variance from guideline range requested by defendant's counsel
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission's Gu: Amendment eliminating recency points, effective November 1, 2010
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Department of Justice: Agency responsible for overseeing the enforcement of the Plea Agreement
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Court of Appeals for the F: Court that gives great weight to defendant's statements at the plea colloquy
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's Affidavit: Document submitted by Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa claiming he did not understand the Plea Agreement
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission: Agency responsible for establishing federal sentencing guidelines, contends that counsel's conduct was not objectively unreasonable
